[subset] Fix wrong offset base for subsetting LigatureArray. Offsets from LigatureArray must be relative to the beginning of the LigatureArray table. For the serialization mechanism to use the correct beginning point the LigatureArray must be created using the push()/pop() mechanism. So convert LigatureArray subsetting to use serialize_subset() instead of a manually called serialize and subset.
